name: Baie des Trépassés (Lescoff)
description: Covering all the breaks in the area but assuming a South East wind is offshore - a variety of spots face in different directions here so offshore winds should be acheivable - adjust the forecast accordingly.

name: Biarritz Grande Plage
description: Covering all the main town breaks and surrounding area.

name: Biscarrosse-Plage
description: Covering all breaks north to La Salie and south to Mimizan Plage.

name: Blancs-Sablons
description: Covering a range of breaks near Brest and assuming that a south east wind is offshore (adjust for other spots)

name: Capbreton (La Piste/VVF)
description: We don't have any details about Capbreton (La Piste/VVF) at the moment.

name: Casernes
description: Classic Landes beachbreak, all tides depending on the sand

name: Chassiron
description: Covering all spots on the Ile D'Oleron but assuming a North East wind is offshore (adjust for other spots). Also good for the Cote Sauvage to the south and spots around La Rochelle

name: Etretat
description: Covering Etretat and other breaks in the area.

name: Fouesnou
description: Fouesnou

name: Gouillaud
description:
One main reef break, breaking left and right. Best wind 
direction is North-East. Wave direction is West. Best 
time to go surfing is low-tide till low-tide + 3hours.

Depending on the wind direction Gouillaud can be both a 
windsurf/kitesurf spot or a surf / SUP spot.
Best wind direction for Windsurf/kite is West/North-West.

BE CAREFUL WITH THE ROCKS. On low-tide you can walk 200 meters west to go to the water without having to walk through the rocks.

name: Guidel (Les Kaolins)
description: Covering all breaks in the area north and west of Lorlent.

name: Hossegor (La Nord)
description: Covering all the main breaks

name: Hourtin
description: Beachbreak crowded on the weekends.

name: Ilbarritz
description: Covers Marbella, Bora Bora and Edouard VII

name: L'Aubraie
description: Covering all breaks in the area based on a North East wind blowing offshore (adjust for other spots).

name: La Torche
description: This forecast covers all spots in the Penmarch / Ploneour Lavern area.

name: Lacanau
description: Covering all the breaks in the area - including Carcans to the North and La Porge etc. south to Cap Ferret

name: Lampaul Ploudalmezeau
description: Covering a range of spots but giving wind reports based on the south east offshore required at Penfoul.

name: Le Dossen
description: Covering the main Le Dossen beach break and a number of decent reef breaks in the area.

name: Le Lizay
description:
Works best from 3 hours before high tide to high tide. Best swell 
direction : West / North-West. Best wind directions : South East, South, South West.

name: Le Rozel
description: Covering the area from Cap De La Hague south to Cap de Careteret and good for spots near Cherbourg (but assumes an east wind is offshore).

name: Les Donnants
description: Covering Quiberon and also breaks near Port de Donnant and south of Lorlent

name: Les Roches Blanches (Pointe Leydé)
description: Les Roches Blanches

name: Messanges
description: French beachbreak, with two main peaks one, left hander, slighty south, and a left and right peak, just slighty north, both work from mid to high on a NW swell, holds up to max 1.5 meters and barrels hard.

name: Mimizan-Plage
description: Covering all the breaks in the area. Because this stretch of coast shows little variation this will be good for breaks some way south and north.

name: Plage du Sillon (St Malo)
description: Covering all breaks in the St Malo to Cap Frehel area (assuming a south east wind is offshore - adjust for other spots)

name: Soulac
description: With the main beaches sheltered from offshore sandbars this forecast will show the outside swell not the amount hitting the beach. This makes Soulac a good spot when the rest of the coast is closing out in a heavy swell.

name: Surtainville
description: Beach break, can hold bigger swells and is best from mid to high tide.

name: Trestaou
description: Covering Tregastel Plage and Beg Leguer a little way south. Also good for other spots in the area.

name: Trouville
description: Little longboard spot in Normandy...

name: Vieux Boucau
description: Covering breaks in the area including Moliets Plage.
